name: Comrade Kickinator
description:
Comrade Kickinator

Shoot and kick your way through several planets on your journey to the power source as the intrepid mechanized cosmonaut Comrade Kickinator!
Kick a level square to start playing! If you run out of ammo, you can kick enemies to refill it. Once you reach the end, you enter rollerskate mode where you can propel yourself with bullets and kicking off walls.

Controls

Movement - WASD or Arrow keys.
Shooting -  Left click to charge, release to shoot towards the mouse.
Kicking - Right click or spacebar to kick towards the mouse.
Pause - Escape key

Credits

Will C. - Level design, combat balancing, and game flow systems.
Oliver B. - Player mechanics, enemy AI, camera movement, and sound design
Adrian S. - Environment and character art/animation
Kaden D. - Character art/animation, UI development
Makenna S. - Character art/animation
